title: Matthew McConaughey: BASED or CONFUSED About Guns?
description:
Matthew McConaughey took over the White House on Tuesday to lecture Americans on guns. It wasn't all bad, but the bad stuff was HORRIBLE! We break it down point by point. Also, pro-abortion extremists are on the rampage, and you won't see it on the news. And the FBI has failed, once again, at stopping pedos. #MatthewMcConaughey #GunControl #GunReform 

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/
